AOMOY.summary: Public Joint Stock Company Mosenergo engages in the generation of heat and electric power in the Moscow City and Moscow region. It operates in two segments, Electric Energy and Heat Energy. The company owns 15 power plants with an operational capacity of approximately 12,825 megawatts of electricity; and 43, 211 gigacalories/hour of heat capacity. It is also involved in the provision of repair and reconstruction services. In addition, the company provides electrical engineering services. Public Joint Stock Company Mosenergo was founded in 1886 and is based in Moscow, Russia. Public Joint Stock Company Mosenergo is a subsidiary of Gazprom Energoholding LLC.

ASSB.ME.long_name: Astrakhan Power Sale Company Public Joint-Stock Company
ASSB.ME.summary: Astrakhan Power Sale Company Public Joint Stock Company supplies power primarily in Russia. It purchases and sells electricity to consumers, industrial enterprises, social infrastructure facilities, housing and communal services, and commercial organizations. The company is headquartered in Astrakhan, Russia.

DVEC.ME.long_name: Public joint stock company FAR-EASTERN ENERGY COMPANY
DVEC.ME.summary: Public joint stock company FAR-EASTERN ENERGY COMPANY supplies electricity to individuals and enterprises in Russia. It purchases and sells electricity in the wholesale market. The company serves individuals and corporate customers in the territory of Primorsky Krai, Khabarovsk region, Amur region, and Jewish autonomous region. The company is based in Vladivostok, Russia. Public joint stock company FAR-EASTERN ENERGY COMPANY operates as a subsidiary of Public Joint-Stock Company Federal Hydro-Generating Company - RusHydro.

ENRU.ME.summary: Public Joint-Stock Company Enel Russia generates and sells electric power and heat in Russia. Its installed capacity is approximately 5,628.7 megawatts for power and 2,032 GCal/h for heat. The company was founded in 2004 and is based in Yekaterinburg, Russia. Public Joint-Stock Company Enel Russia is a subsidiary of Enel SpA.

F9SA.F.long_name: Public Joint-Stock Company Federal Grid Company of Unified Energy System
F9SA.F.summary: Public Joint-Stock Company Federal Grid Company of Unified Energy System operates and manages electricity transmission grid infrastructure of Unified National Electric Grid in Russia. The company offers electricity transmission services to regional distribution companies, retail electricity suppliers, and large industrial enterprises; and maintains and develops the grid system and supervises grid facilities and infrastructure in 79 Russian regions. It also provides electricity transmission and technological connection services to participants of the wholesale electricity and capacity market. The company operates approximately 148,270 kilometers of transmission lines and 951 substations with approximately 352 GVA. The company was founded in 2002 and is based in Moscow, Russia. Public Joint-Stock Company Federal Grid Company of Unified Energy System is a subsidiary of PJSC Rosseti.

F9SA.SG.long_name: Public Joint-Stock Company Federal Grid Company of Unified Energy System
F9SA.SG.summary: Public Joint-Stock Company Federal Grid Company of Unified Energy System operates and manages electricity transmission grid infrastructure of Unified National Electric Grid in Russia. The company offers electricity transmission services to regional distribution companies, retail electricity suppliers, and large industrial enterprises; and maintains and develops the grid system and supervises grid facilities and infrastructure in 79 Russian regions. It also provides electricity transmission and technological connection services to participants of the wholesale electricity and capacity market. The company operates approximately 148,270 kilometers of transmission lines and 951 substations with approximately 352 GVA. The company was founded in 2002 and is based in Moscow, Russia. Public Joint-Stock Company Federal Grid Company of Unified Energy System is a subsidiary of PJSC Rosseti.

FEES.ME.long_name: Public Joint-Stock Company Federal Grid Company of Unified Energy System
FEES.ME.summary: Public Joint-Stock Company Federal Grid Company of Unified Energy System operates and manages electricity transmission grid infrastructure of Unified National Electric Grid in Russia. The company offers electricity transmission services to regional distribution companies, retail electricity suppliers, and large industrial enterprises; and maintains and develops the grid system and supervises grid facilities and infrastructure in 79 Russian regions. It also provides electricity transmission and technological connection services to participants of the wholesale electricity and capacity market. The company operates approximately 148,270 kilometers of transmission lines and 951 substations with approximately 352 GVA. The company was founded in 2002 and is based in Moscow, Russia. Public Joint-Stock Company Federal Grid Company of Unified Energy System is a subsidiary of PJSC Rosseti.

HYDR.ME.long_name: Public Joint-Stock Company Federal Hydro-Generating Company - RusHydro
HYDR.ME.summary: Public Joint-Stock Company Federal Hydro-Generating Company - RusHydro, together with its subsidiaries, generates, transmits, distributes, and sells electricity and heat in Russia. The company generates electricity from water flows, solar, wind, and geothermal energy. It operates approximately 400 power generation facilities. The company has an installed electricity generation capacity of 39.5 GW. It also engages in the research and development, planning and surveying, engineering, construction, and energy retailing activities. The company was founded in 2004 and is based in Moscow, Russia.

HYDR.VI.long_name: Public Joint-Stock Company Federal Hydro-Generating Company - RusHydro
HYDR.VI.summary: Public Joint-Stock Company Federal Hydro-Generating Company - RusHydro, together with its subsidiaries, generates, transmits, distributes, and sells electricity and heat in Russia. The company generates electricity from water flows, solar, wind, and geothermal energy. It operates approximately 400 power generation facilities. The company has an installed electricity generation capacity of 39.5 GW. It also engages in the research and development, planning and surveying, engineering, construction, and energy retailing activities. The company was founded in 2004 and is based in Moscow, Russia.

IRAO.ME.long_name: Public Joint Stock Company Inter RAO UES
IRAO.ME.summary: Public Joint Stock Company Inter RAO UES operates as a diversified energy holding company in Russia and internationally. The company operates through Supply in the Russian Federation, Electric Power Generation in the Russian Federation, Thermal Power Generation in the Russian Federation, Trading in the Russian Federation and Europe, Foreign Assets, and Engineering in the Russian Federation segments. It produces, supplies, exports, and imports electricity; and offers engineering services. The company generates electricity through thermal, hydro, wind, and gas sources. It also engages in export of power industry equipment; and management of distribution grids outside Russia. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Moscow, Russia.

IRGZ.ME.long_name: Irkutsk Public Joint Stock Company of Energetics and Electrification
IRGZ.ME.summary: Irkutsk Public Joint Stock Company of Energetics and Electrification engages in the power generation activities in Russia. The company operates three hydraulic power plants and nine thermal power plants with an installed capacity of 12.9 thousand MW. It also operates electricity and heat transmission networks. The company was founded in 1992 and is based in Irkutsk, Russia. Irkutsk Public Joint Stock Company of Energetics and Electrification is a subsidiary of EuroSibEnergo PLC.

KBSB.ME.long_name: Public Joint Stock Company "TNS energo Kuban"
KBSB.ME.summary: Public Joint Stock Company ÂTNS energo KubanÂ purchases and sells electric energy in the Krasnodar region and the Republic of Adygea. The company purchases electricity from the wholesale and retail electrical energy markets; and sells it to consumers and grid companies in the wholesale and retail electrical energy marketsThe company was formerly known as Kubanenergosbyt OJSC and changed its name to Public Joint Stock Company ÂTNS energo KubanÂ in August 2017. The company was founded in 2006 and is based in Krasnodar, Russia. Public Joint Stock Company ÂTNS energo KubanÂ is a subsidiary of Public Joint Stock Company Group of Companies TNS energo.

KCHE.ME.summary: Public Joint Stock Company Kamchatskenergo engages in the generation, transmission, distribution, and sale of electric and thermal energy in Russia. It also offers services for the operation of energy facilities; and undertakes other activities. The company was founded in 1964 and is based in Petropavlovsk-Kamchatskiy, Russia. Public Joint Stock Company Kamchatskenergo is a subsidiary of PJSC RusHydro.

KCHEP.ME.summary: Public Joint Stock Company Kamchatskenergo engages in the generation, transmission, distribution, and sale of electric and thermal energy in Russia. It also offers services for the operation of energy facilities; and undertakes other activities. The company was founded in 1964 and is based in Petropavlovsk-Kamchatskiy, Russia. Public Joint Stock Company Kamchatskenergo is a subsidiary of PJSC RusHydro.

KGKC.ME.long_name: Public Joint Stock Company Kurgan Generation Company
KGKC.ME.summary: Public Joint Stock Company Kurgan Generation Company produces electricity and heat in Russia. It operates electric power generating facilities with a total installed capacity of 473 megawatts; and heat generating facilities with an installed capacity of 2093 gigacalories per hour. The company was founded in 2006 and is based in Kurgan, Russia.

KGKCP.ME.long_name: Public Joint Stock Company Kurgan Generation Company
KGKCP.ME.summary: Public Joint Stock Company Kurgan Generation Company produces electricity and heat in Russia. It operates electric power generating facilities with a total installed capacity of 473 megawatts; and heat generating facilities with an installed capacity of 2093 gigacalories per hour. The company was founded in 2006 and is based in Kurgan, Russia.

KLSB.ME.long_name: Kaluga Power Sale Company Public Joint-Stock Company
KLSB.ME.summary: Kaluga Power Sale Company Public Joint-Stock Company engages in the production, wholesale, and retail of electrical energy in the Kaluga region, Russia. It operates a gas turbine plant that has an installed capacity of approximately 20.8 MW of electricity and 49.88 Gcal/h thermal energy. The company was founded in 2004 and is based in Kaluga, Russia. Kaluga Power Sale Company Public Joint-Stock Company operates as a subsidiary of Kaluzhskaya gorodskaya energeticheskaya kompaniya OAO.

KRSB.ME.summary: Public Joint Stock Company Krasnoyarskenergosbyt sells electricity in Russia. The company also engages in the sale and maintenance of electricity meters; testing and measuring parameters of electrical equipment; conducting thermal imaging surveys; and preparing documentation for concluding an energy supply contract. In addition, it provides services in the fields of housing and communal services, such as plumbing, electrical, and general construction. Public Joint Stock Company Krasnoyarskenergosbyt is based in Krasnoyarsk, Russia.

KRSBP.ME.summary: Public Joint Stock Company Krasnoyarskenergosbyt sells electricity in Russia. The company also engages in the sale and maintenance of electricity meters; testing and measuring parameters of electrical equipment; conducting thermal imaging surveys; and preparing documentation for concluding an energy supply contract. In addition, it provides services in the fields of housing and communal services, such as plumbing, electrical, and general construction. Public Joint Stock Company Krasnoyarskenergosbyt is based in Krasnoyarsk, Russia.

KTSB.ME.summary: Public Joint Stock Company Kostroma Power Sale Company supplies electricity in Russia. It serves approximately 8 thousand legal entities and approximately 300 thousand households in 303 municipalities located in the Kostroma region. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Kostroma, Russia. Public Joint Stock Company Kostroma Power Sale Company is a subsidiary of Rusenergocapital Management Company.

KUBE.ME.summary: Rosseti Kuban PJSC, a power grid company, provides electricity transmission and distribution services in Russia. It operates approximately 91.644 thousand kilometers of electricity transmission lines. The company serves 6 million people in the Krasnodar region and the Republic of Adygea. It is also involved in the organization of recreation and health improvement facilities for children and adults; and arrangement and holding of seminars and conferences. In addition, the company designs, installs, and commissions metering units for electricity, gas, and technological equipment; and supplies hot and cold water. The company was formerly known as Kuban power and electrification public joint stock company and changed its name to Rosseti Kuban PJSC in October 2020. The company is based in Krasnodar, Russia. Rosseti Kuban PJSC is a subsidiary of PJSC Rosseti.

LPSB.ME.long_name: Lipetsk Power Sale Company Open Joint-Stock Company
LPSB.ME.summary: Lipetsk Power Sale Company Open Joint-Stock Company engages in the supply of electricity to businesses and individuals in the Lipetsk region, Russia. It serves 14,000 organizations and approximately 550,000 individual customers. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Lipetsk, Russia. Lipetsk Power Sale Company Open Joint-Stock Company is a subsidiary of Zefavel Trading Limited.

LSNG.ME.long_name: Public Joint stock company Rosseti Lenenergo
LSNG.ME.summary: Public Joint-Stock Company Lenenergo operates as an electricity distribution company in Russia. The company offers electricity transmission and distribution, grid connection, and other services related with electricity supply. It also provides repair and maintenance of equipment for third-party legal entities; connection/disconnection services for consumers; engineering services, such as designing utilities and systems of power supply and electric lighting; services on organization of electricity metering; installation, checkout, and repair of the power equipment; and insulation resistance measurement. In addition, the company is involved in the testing, diagnosing, and inspection of electrical installations, as well as offers educational and other services. It operates 0.4-110 kilovolt (kV) networks with an installed capacity of 31,503 megavolt-ampere; 638 electric power transmission lines of the 110-750 kV with the total length of 12,498.7 kilometers; and 386 transformer substations in Saint Petersburg and the Leningrad region. The company was founded in 1886 and is based in Saint Petersburg, Russia. Public Joint-Stock Company Lenenergo is a subsidiary of Rosseti, Public Joint Stock Company.

LSNGP.ME.long_name: Public Joint stock company Rosseti Lenenergo
LSNGP.ME.summary: Public Joint-Stock Company Lenenergo operates as an electricity distribution company in Russia. The company offers electricity transmission and distribution, grid connection, and other services related with electricity supply. It also provides repair and maintenance of equipment for third-party legal entities; connection/disconnection services for consumers; engineering services, such as designing utilities and systems of power supply and electric lighting; services on organization of electricity metering; installation, checkout, and repair of the power equipment; and insulation resistance measurement. In addition, the company is involved in the testing, diagnosing, and inspection of electrical installations, as well as offers educational and other services. It operates 0.4-110 kilovolt (kV) networks with an installed capacity of 31,503 megavolt-ampere; 638 electric power transmission lines of the 110-750 kV with the total length of 12,498.7 kilometers; and 386 transformer substations in Saint Petersburg and the Leningrad region. The company was founded in 1886 and is based in Saint Petersburg, Russia. Public Joint-Stock Company Lenenergo is a subsidiary of Rosseti, Public Joint Stock Company.

MAGE.ME.summary: Public Joint Stock Company Magadanenergo engages in the generation, transmission, and distribution of electricity and heat in Russia. The company is also involved in the repair, reconstruction, and modernization of energy facilities, as well as maintenance of transport, buildings, and structures of the power system. It also conducts repairs for transformers and generators, as well as other installations; and manufactures and repairs equipment of power units of heat, coils, boilers heating surfaces, half couplings, fittings, gas ducts, etc. The company supplies electricity in the Magadan region, Chukotka Autonomous district, and Nizhnekolymsky Oymyakon ulus; and heat in Magadan, Anadyr, Pevek, Myaundzha, and Egvekinot. It has electric power stations with an installed capacity of 320 MW; and installed thermal capacity of the stations is 646 Gcal / h. Public Joint Stock Company Magadanenergo was founded in 1966 and is based in Magadan, Russia.

MAGEP.ME.summary: Public Joint Stock Company Magadanenergo engages in the generation, transmission, and distribution of electricity and heat in Russia. The company is also involved in the repair, reconstruction, and modernization of energy facilities, as well as maintenance of transport, buildings, and structures of the power system. It also conducts repairs for transformers and generators, as well as other installations; and manufactures and repairs equipment of power units of heat, coils, boilers heating surfaces, half couplings, fittings, gas ducts, etc. The company supplies electricity in the Magadan region, Chukotka Autonomous district, and Nizhnekolymsky Oymyakon ulus; and heat in Magadan, Anadyr, Pevek, Myaundzha, and Egvekinot. It has electric power stations with an installed capacity of 320 MW; and installed thermal capacity of the stations is 646 Gcal / h. Public Joint Stock Company Magadanenergo was founded in 1966 and is based in Magadan, Russia.

MISB.ME.long_name: Public Joint-stock Company TNS energo Mari El
MISB.ME.summary: Public Joint-stock Company TNS energo Mari El supplies electricity in the territory of the Republic of Mari El. The company serves 313,165 individuals and 7,714 legal entities. It also offers electronic receipts and mobile application services. The company was formerly known as Joint-Stock Company Marienergosbyt and changed its name to Public Joint-stock Company TNS energo Mari El in June 2015. The company is based in Yoshkar-Ola, Russia. Public Joint-stock Company TNS energo Mari El is a subsidiary of Public Joint Stock Company Group of Companies TNS energo.

MRKC.ME.long_name: Interregional Distribution Grid Company of Centre, Public Joint Stock Company
MRKC.ME.summary: Interregional Distribution Grid Company of Centre, Public Joint Stock Company operates as an electric grid company of Russia. The company provides power transmission and distribution; and grid connections services. It supplies electricity to the industrial manufacturers, transport companies, agricultural producers, community facilities, and guaranteeing suppliers. The company was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Moscow, Russia. Interregional Distribution Grid Company of Centre, Public Joint Stock Company is a subsidiary of PJSC ROSSETI.

MRKK.ME.long_name: Public Joint Stock Company "ROSSETI Northern Caucasus"
MRKK.ME.summary: Public Joint Stock Company "ROSSETI Northern Caucasus" provides power transmission and distribution services in the Republic of Ingushetia. It also engages in the technological connection of consumers to the grid infrastructure; and buys and sells electric power and capacity in wholesale and retail markets. The company is based in Pyatigorsk, Russia. Public Joint Stock Company "ROSSETI Northern Caucasus" operates as a subsidiary of Rosseti, Public Joint Stock Company.

MRKP.ME.long_name: Interregional Distribution Grid Company of Center and Volga Region, Public Joint Stock Company
MRKP.ME.summary: Interregional Distribution Grid Company of Center and Volga Region, Public Joint Stock Company, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the transmission and distribution of electricity in Russia. It offers power transmission and distribution services to electric grids located in Vladimir, Ivanovo, Kaluga, Kirov, Nizhny Novgorod, Ryazan, and Tula regions, as well as in the Republic of Mary El and the Republic of Udmurtia. The company also designs, installs, and commissions metering stations for electricity, hot and cold water supply, heat energy, gas, and boiler plants and supporting processing equipment, as well as provides facilities maintenance services; and supplies heat energy. In addition, it offers medical rehabilitation services; physical, healthcare, and spa services; accommodation and catering services; transport and warehouse services; and vehicles repair and maintenance services. The company was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Nizhny Novgorod, Russia. Interregional Distribution Grid Company of Center and Volga Region, Public Joint Stock Company is a subsidiary of Rosseti, Public Joint Stock Company.

MRKS.ME.long_name: Public Joint Stock Company Interregional Distribution Grid Company of Siberia
MRKS.ME.summary: Public Joint-Stock Company Interregional Distribution Grid Company of Siberia, together with its subsidiaries, transmits and distributes electricity for power grids in Russia. It also provides services for technological connection of consumers to the network. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Krasnoyarsk, Russia. Public Joint-Stock Company Interregional Distribution Grid Company of Siberia is a subsidiary of PJSC Russian Grids.

MRKU.ME.long_name: Interregional Distribution Grid Company of Urals, Joint Stock Company
MRKU.ME.summary: Interregional Distribution Grid Company of Urals, Joint Stock Company provides electricity transmission, distribution, and sales services in Russia. The company offers networks connection, and power equipment and safety control testing services; and collects, transmits, and processes technological information, including metering and performance data. It is involved in the operation of technical management and control over energy-saving and consumption; and maintenance, diagnostics, repair of power lines, measurement and metering devices, relay and stability control schemes, etc. In addition, the company undertakes engineering, construction and reconstruction, upgrading, installation, and mounting of networks and grid facilities. It operates a network of 122,733 km of 0.4-220 kV aerial lines; 7,224 km of 0.4-110 kV cable lines; 1,049 35-220-kV substations with the capacity of 21,863 MVA; and 31,864 6-10(35)/0.4-kV substations with the capacity of 9,228 MVA. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Yekaterinburg, Russia. Interregional Distribution Grid Company of Urals, Joint Stock Company is a subsidiary of Rosseti, Public Joint Stock Company.

MRKV.ME.long_name: Public Joint Stock Company Rosseti Volga
MRKV.ME.summary: Public Joint Stock Company Rosseti Volga transmits and distributes electric power in Russia. It is involved in the technological connection to electric grids. It offers hotel accommodation, sanatorium, and resort, as well as medical treatment and prophylactic services; produces and trades in foodstuff; organizes public catering; and engages in trading, intermediary, sale, and marketing operations. It maintains working capacity of electric and thermal networks; undertakes design, and civil and knot works of the accounts of electric power, and hot and cold water supply; designs, installs, and adjusts the knots of the accounts of heat, gas, and process equipment; installs and adjusts process equipment, boiler installations, and auxiliaries; installs and adjusts instrumentations and units fuel consuming units; organizes and carries out power audit; and engages in the civil repair works, assembly, specialized works on installation of systems of gas supply, and service of objects. It provides medical, advisory, expert, tourist, informational, organizational, and administrative services; conducts prophylactic, sanitary, and informational works; and offers institution's employee protection services, as well as organizes active rest and cultural leisure for patients, recreation events, physical training, sports, tourist, children's recreational camps, and other mass events. It also transports passengers by motor transport and cars, as well as cargoes by motor transport; rents motor transport, agricultural and construction machinery, and equipment to individuals and legal entities; and maintains and repairs motor vehicles. The company was formerly known as Interregional Distribution Grid Company of Volga, Public Joint-Stock Company and changed its name to Public Joint Stock Company Rosseti Volga in August 2020. The company was founded in 2007 and is based in Saratov, Russia. Public Joint Stock Company Rosseti Volga is a subsidiary of Rosseti, Public Joint Stock Company.

MRKY.ME.summary: Public Joint Stock Company "ROSSETI South" transmits and distributes electricity in Russia. It also engages in the technical testing, research and certification, analysis of the mechanical and electrical characteristics of the finished product, design and construction works, professional, scientific, technical, and other activities; production, processing, and sale of agricultural products; telephone service and commercial activities, as well as the provision of management consulting, excursions, cultural, and entertainment services. The company also operates sanatorium recreation facility associated with the treatment and rehabilitation of adults, parents with children, and organized groups of school age children. It serves electricity retailers, entities of the wholesale and retail electricity markets, and local grid organizations. The company was founded in 2007 and is based in Rostov-on-Don, Russia. Public Joint Stock Company "ROSSETI South" operates as a subsidiary of Rosseti, Public Joint Stock Company.

MRKZ.ME.long_name: Public Joint-Stock Company Interregional Distribution Grid Company of the North-West
MRKZ.ME.summary: Public Joint-Stock Company Interregional Distribution Grid Company of the North-West, together with its subsidiaries owns and operates electric power transmission and distribution grids in the North-Western region of Russia. The company operates 177.1 thousand kilometers (km) of overhead transmission lines; 176,064 thousand km of cable power lines; and 35KV substations. It also operates and develops power metering system services.The company was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Saint Petersburg, Russia. Public Joint-Stock Company Interregional Distribution Grid Company of the North-West is a subsidiary of Rosseti, Public Joint Stock Company.

MRO.F.summary: Public Joint Stock Company Mosenergo engages in the generation of heat and electric power in the Moscow City and Moscow region. It operates in two segments, Electric Energy and Heat Energy. The company owns 15 power plants with an operational capacity of approximately 12,825 megawatts of electricity; and 43, 211 gigacalories/hour of heat capacity. It is also involved in the provision of repair and reconstruction services. In addition, the company provides electrical engineering services. Public Joint Stock Company Mosenergo was founded in 1886 and is based in Moscow, Russia. Public Joint Stock Company Mosenergo is a subsidiary of Gazprom Energoholding LLC.

MRSB.ME.long_name: Mordovia Energy Retail Company Public Joint-Stock Company
MRSB.ME.summary: Mordovia Energy Retail Company Public Joint-Stock Company, an energy company, purchases and sells electricity in the wholesale and retail markets in Russia. It provides various services, including consulting and other, AMR, and installation of electricity meters related to the implementation of the electricity to businesses and individuals, as well as services for the commercialization of electric power. The company supplies electricity to 6,190 businesses and 214,521 individuals. Mordovia Energy Retail Company Public Joint-Stock Company was founded in 1964 and is based in Saransk, Russia.

MSNG.ME.summary: Public Joint Stock Company Mosenergo engages in the generation of heat and electric power in the Moscow City and Moscow region. MSRS.ME.summary: Public Joint-Stock Company "Rosseti Moscow Region", together with its subsidiaries, engages in the transmission of electricity through electrical networks primarily in Moscow, Russia. It also installs, repairs, and maintains electrical equipment; and offers technical connection services. The company was formerly known as Public Joint Stock Company ÂMoscow United Electric Grid CompanyÂ and changed its name to Public Joint Stock Company ÂRosseti Moscow RegionÂ in July 2020. The company is headquartered in Moscow, Russia. Public Joint-Stock Company "Rosseti Moscow Region" operates as a subsidiary of Rosseti, Public Joint Stock Company.

NNSB.ME.long_name: Public Joint-Stock Company TNS energo Nizhny Novgorod
NNSB.ME.summary: Public Joint-Stock Company TNS energo Nizhny Novgorod operates as an energy supply company in the Nizhny Novgorod region. The company serves approximately 34.9 thousand legal entities and 1.22 million individuals. Its clients include industrial enterprises, small and medium businesses, public sector institutions, and individuals. The company is based in Nizhny Novgorod, Russia. Public Joint-Stock Company TNS energo Nizhny Novgorod is a subsidiary of Public Joint Stock Company Group of Companies TNS energo.

NNSBP.ME.long_name: Public Joint-Stock Company TNS energo Nizhny Novgorod
NNSBP.ME.summary: Public Joint-Stock Company TNS energo Nizhny Novgorod operates as an energy supply company in the Nizhny Novgorod region. The company serves approximately 34.9 thousand legal entities and 1.22 million individuals. Its clients include industrial enterprises, small and medium businesses, public sector institutions, and individuals. The company is based in Nizhny Novgorod, Russia. Public Joint-Stock Company TNS energo Nizhny Novgorod is a subsidiary of Public Joint Stock Company Group of Companies TNS energo.

OGKB.ME.long_name: Public Joint-Stock Company "Second Generating Company of the Electric Power Wholesale Market"
OGKB.ME.summary: Public Joint-Stock Company ÂSecond Generating Company of the Electric Power Wholesale Market', together with its subsidiaries, generates and sells electricity and thermal energy in Russia. As of December 31, 2019, it had 12 active power plants with total installed electric capacity of 19 MW and heat capacity of 3,959.28 Gcal. The company serves the wholesale market of electric energy; and supplies electricity, heat, and thermal energy to the retail electricity and industrial consumers. It is also involved in the organization and implementation of fire prevention, firefighting, and rescue works; designing and construction management; and provision of cargo and passenger transportation, industrial railway transportation, and sanatorium and resort services, as well as invests in securities. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Saint Petersburg, Russia. Public Joint-Stock Company ÂSecond Generating Company of the Electric Power Wholesale Market' is a subsidiary of Public Joint Stock Company Centrenergoholding.

PMSB.ME.long_name: Public Joint Stock Company Perm Energy Supplying Company
PMSB.ME.summary: Public Joint Stock Company Perm Energy Supplying Company engages in the electricity supply to the population and organizations of the Perm Krai. It also sells electricity metering devices, water and gas meters, cable and wiring products, lamps, shield equipment, equipment for receiving digital television, tickets, and products for home and office online. Public Joint Stock Company Perm Energy Supplying Company was formerly known as Perm Power Sale Company Open Joint-Stock Company and changed its name to Public Joint Stock Company Perm Energy Supplying Company in July 2015. The company was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Perm, Russia with branches in Kungur, Zakamsky, Gubakha, Kudymkar, and Ocher, Russia.

PMSBP.ME.long_name: Public Joint Stock Company Perm Energy Supplying Company
PMSBP.ME.summary: Public Joint Stock Company Perm Energy Supplying Company engages in the electricity supply to the population and organizations of the Perm Krai. RG2A.F.summary: Public Joint-Stock Company Federal Hydro-Generating Company - RusHydro, together with its subsidiaries, generates, transmits, distributes, and sells electricity and heat in Russia. The company generates electricity from water flows, solar, wind, and geothermal energy. It operates approximately 400 power generation facilities. The company has an installed electricity generation capacity of 39.5 GW. It also engages in the research and development, planning and surveying, engineering, construction, and energy retailing activities. The company was founded in 2004 and is based in Moscow, Russia.

RSHYY.long_name: Public Joint-Stock Company Federal Hydro-Generating Company - RusHydro
RSHYY.summary: Public Joint-Stock Company Federal Hydro-Generating Company - RusHydro, together with its subsidiaries, generates, transmits, distributes, and sells electricity and heat energy in Russia. It generates power through approximately 60 renewable energy source facilities, including hydropower, wind power, and geo-thermal. The company has an installed electricity generation capacity of 39.5 GW. It also engages in the research and development, engineering, and electricity retail activities. The company was founded in 2004 and is based in Moscow, Russia.

RSTI.ME.summary: Rosseti, Public Joint Stock Company, together with its subsidiaries, provides electricity transmission and distribution services in Russia. The company also provides technological connection services. It operates 2.37 million kilometers of power transmission lines; and 517,000 substations with transformer capacity of approximately 802 gigavolt-ampere. The company was formerly known as JSC Russian Grids and changed its name to Rosseti, Public Joint Stock Company in August 2014. Rosseti, Public Joint Stock Company is based in Moscow, Russia.

RSTIP.ME.summary: Rosseti, Public Joint Stock Company, together with its subsidiaries, provides electricity transmission and distribution services in Russia. The company also provides technological connection services. It operates 2.37 million kilometers of power transmission lines; and 517,000 substations with transformer capacity of approximately 802 gigavolt-ampere. The company was formerly known as JSC Russian Grids and changed its name to Rosseti, Public Joint Stock Company in August 2014. Rosseti, Public Joint Stock Company is based in Moscow, Russia.

RTGZ.ME.long_name: Public Joint Stock Company Gazprom Gazoraspredelenie Rostov-na-Donu
RTGZ.ME.summary: Public Joint Stock Company Gazprom Gazoraspredelenie Rostov-na-Donu engages in the transportation of natural gas in Russia. The company is involved in the construction, operation, and maintenance of gas pipelines in the Rostov region and the Republic of Kalmykia. It operates 45,960 kilometers of external gas pipelines; and 19,370 gas control points. The company was founded in 1982 and is based in Rostov-on-Don, Russia.

RTSB.ME.long_name: Public Joint-Stock Company TNS energo Rostov-on-Don
RTSB.ME.summary: Public Joint-Stock Company TNS energo Rostov-on-Don supplies electricity in the Rostov region, Russia. It serves approximately 1.5 million customers, which include approximately 1.46 million accounts of individuals and approximately 58 thousand accounts of enterprises and organizations. The company was formerly known as OJSC Energosbyt Rostovenergo and changed its name to Public Joint-Stock Company TNS energo Rostov-on-Don in July 2015. Public Joint-Stock Company TNS energo Rostov-on-Don was founded in 2005 and is based in Rostov-on-Don, Russia. Public Joint-Stock Company TNS energo Rostov-on-Don is a subsidiary of Public Joint Stock Company Group of Companies TNS energo.

RTSBP.ME.long_name: Public Joint Stock Company "TNS energo Rostov-on-Don"
RTSBP.ME.summary: Public Joint-Stock Company TNS energo Rostov-on-Don supplies electricity in the Rostov region, Russia. It serves approximately 1.5 million customers, which include approximately 1.46 million accounts of individuals and approximately 58 thousand accounts of enterprises and organizations. The company was formerly known as OJSC Energosbyt Rostovenergo and changed its name to Public Joint-Stock Company TNS energo Rostov-on-Don in July 2015. Public Joint-Stock Company TNS energo Rostov-on-Don was founded in 2005 and is based in Rostov-on-Don, Russia. Public Joint-Stock Company TNS energo Rostov-on-Don is a subsidiary of Public Joint Stock Company Group of Companies TNS energo.

RZSB.ME.summary: Joint-Stock Company Ryazanenergosbyt engages in the purchase and sale of electricity in the wholesale and retail markets in the Ryazan Region, Russia. The company also provides rental services for non-residential premises; metering devices installation services; and other goods sales, works, and services. It serves approximately 435,000 household subscribers and 11,000 legal entities. The company was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Ryazan, Russia. Joint-Stock Company Ryazanenergosbyt is a subsidiary of JSC Energy Supply Company of Rushydro.

SAGO.ME.long_name: Public Joint-Stock Energy and Electrification Company Samaraenergo
SAGO.ME.summary: Public Joint-Stock Energy and Electrification Company Samaraenergo, an energy sales company, supplies electricity in the Samara region. The company purchases electricity from the wholesale market and supplies it to the retail market and consumers. It also purchases electricity from producers; sells, installs, and repairs various electricity meters; and rents equipment. In addition, the company provides consulting and other services related to the sale of electricity to energy supplying organizations and legal entities; and energy audit and saving, and thermal imaging services, as well as ASKUE installation and maintenance services for legal entities and household consumers. It serves chemical, petrochemical, oil refining, metallurgical, machine building enterprises; and railway transportation; and oil production and building materials production markets, as well as individuals. The company is based in Samara, Russia.

SARE.ME.summary: Public Joint Stock Company Saratovenergo supplies electricity in the Saratov region, Russia. It serves approximately 22,000 legal entities and 660,000 household subscribers. The company was formerly known as Energy and Electrification Joint-Stock Company Saratovenergo and changed its name to Public Joint Stock Company Saratovenergo in June 2015. The company was founded in 1933 and is based in Saratov, Russia. Public Joint Stock Company Saratovenergo is a subsidiary of Public Joint Stock Company Inter RAO UES.

SAREP.ME.summary: Public Joint Stock Company Saratovenergo supplies electricity in the Saratov region, Russia. It serves approximately 22,000 legal entities and 660,000 household subscribers. The company was formerly known as Energy and Electrification Joint-Stock Company Saratovenergo and changed its name to Public Joint Stock Company Saratovenergo in June 2015. The company was founded in 1933 and is based in Saratov, Russia. Public Joint Stock Company Saratovenergo is a subsidiary of Public Joint Stock Company Inter RAO UES.

SLEN.ME.summary: Public Joint Stock Company ÂSakhalinenergoÂ engages in the production, transmission, marketing, and supply of electricity and heat in Sakhalin Island, Russia. The company was founded in 1963 and is based in Yuzhno-Sakhalinsk, Russia. Public Joint Stock Company "SakhalinenergoÂ is a subsidiary of Public Joint-Stock Company Federal Hydro-Generating Company Â RusHydro.

STSB.ME.summary: Stavropolenergosbyt Public Joint-Stock Company supplies electricity in the Stavropol territory, Russia. It serves approximately half a million customers, including producers, small businesses, and social and budgetary organizations; and the population of villages and cities, and individual entrepreneurs. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Yessentuki, Russia.

STSBP.ME.summary: Stavropolenergosbyt Public Joint-Stock Company supplies electricity in the Stavropol territory, Russia. It serves approximately half a million customers, including producers, small businesses, and social and budgetary organizations; and the population of villages and cities, and individual entrepreneurs. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Yessentuki, Russia.

TASB.ME.long_name: Public Joint Stock Company Tambov power supply company
TASB.ME.summary: Public Joint Stock Company Tambov Power Supply Company supplies electricity in the Tambov region, Russia. The company provides electricity to approximately 5,900 legal entities and 257,000 individuals. It serves industrial enterprises, and housing and communal sectors. The company was incorporated in 2005 and is based in Tambov, Russia. Public Joint Stock Company Tambov Power Supply Company is a subsidiary of Public Joint Stock Company Inter RAO UES.

TGKA.ME.long_name: Public Joint Stock Company Territorial Generating Company No. 1
TGKA.ME.summary: Public Joint Stock Company ÂTerritorial Generating Company' No.1 produces electricity and heat in the North-West region of Russia. The company generates electricity through hydro and thermal sources. It operates 53 electric generating stations in St. Petersburg, the Republic of Karelia, Leningrad Oblast, and Murmansk Oblast. As of March 12, 2020, the company had an installed electric capacity of 6.9 GW and heating capacity of 13.5 thousand GCal/hr. It sells electricity in the wholesale market of Russia, as well as exports to Finland and Norway. The company was formerly known as Joint Stock Company Territorial Generating Company No.1 and changed its name to Public Joint Stock Company ÂTerritorial Generating Company' No.1 in August 2016. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in St. Petersburg, Russia. Public Joint Stock Company ÂTerritorial Generating Company' No.1 is a subsidiary of Gazprom Energoholding LLC.

TGKB.ME.long_name: Public Joint-Stock Company Territorial Generation Company No.2
TGKB.ME.summary: Public Joint-Stock Company Territorial Generation Company No.2 operates as a thermal power company in the Northwestern and Central Federal districts of Russia. The company produces and supplies electricity, as well as steam and hot water. It also manages 12 power plants, 46 diesel power plants, 69 boilers, and 5 thermal networks. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Yaroslavl, Russia. Public Joint-Stock Company Territorial Generation Company No.2 is a subsidiary of Sovlink LLC.

TGKBP.ME.long_name: Public Joint-Stock Company Territorial Generation Company No.2
TGKBP.ME.summary: Public Joint-Stock Company Territorial Generation Company No.2 operates as a thermal power company in the Northwestern and Central Federal districts of Russia. The company produces and supplies electricity, as well as steam and hot water. It also manages 12 power plants, 46 diesel power plants, 69 boilers, and 5 thermal networks. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Yaroslavl, Russia. Public Joint-Stock Company Territorial Generation Company No.2 is a subsidiary of Sovlink LLC.

TGKD.ME.long_name: Public Joint Stock Company "Quadra - Power Generation"
TGKD.ME.summary: Public Joint Stock Company "Quadra - Power Generation", together with its subsidiaries, generates, transmission, and sells electricity and thermal energy in Russia. It is also involved in the transportation of thermal energy. The company sells electricity on the wholesale electricity and capacity market; and thermal energy on the retail market. As of December 31, 2019, it operates electric power plants with an installed capacity of 2,939 MW; and thermal energy plants with an installed capacity of 14,746 gigacalorie per hour that are located in the regions of Belgorod, Bryansk, Voronezh, Kaluga, Kursk, Lipetsk, Orel, Ryazan, Smolensk, Tambov, and Tula. Public Joint Stock Company "Quadra - Power Generation" was founded in 2005 and is based in Tula, Russia.

TGKDP.ME.long_name: Public Joint Stock Company "Quadra - Power Generation"
TGKDP.ME.summary: Public Joint Stock Company "Quadra - Power Generation", together with its subsidiaries, generates, transmission, and sells electricity and thermal energy in Russia. It is also involved in the transportation of thermal energy. The company sells electricity on the wholesale electricity and capacity market; and thermal energy on the retail market. As of December 31, 2019, it operates electric power plants with an installed capacity of 2,939 MW; and thermal energy plants with an installed capacity of 14,746 gigacalorie per hour that are located in the regions of Belgorod, Bryansk, Voronezh, Kaluga, Kursk, Lipetsk, Orel, Ryazan, Smolensk, Tambov, and Tula. Public Joint Stock Company "Quadra - Power Generation" was founded in 2005 and is based in Tula, Russia.

TGKN.ME.long_name: Public Joint Stock Company Territorial Generation Company No. 14
TGKN.ME.summary: Public Joint Stock Company Territorial Generation Company No. 14 engages in the generation and supply of electricity and heat to wholesale market. It offers thermal energy and heat to consumers in the Trans-Baikal Territory and the Republic of Buryatia. The company has 7 thermal power stations and 2 energy complexes with an installed electric power capacity of 649.57 MW and thermal capacity of 3,120.77 Gcal/h. Public Joint Stock Company Territorial Generation Company No. 14 was founded in 2004 and is based in Chita, Russia.

TNSE.ME.long_name: Public Joint Stock Company Group of Companies TNS energo
TNSE.ME.summary: Public Joint Stock Company Group of Companies TNS energo operates as an independent energy supply company in Russia. The company is also involved in the wholesale of power; and construction and installation of electricity meters. It supplies electricity to approximately 20 million consumers, as well as operates 381 consumer service points in 11 regions of Russia. The company was formerly known as Transneftservis S LLC. Public Joint Stock Company Group of Companies TNS energo was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Moscow, Russia.

TORS.ME.summary: public-stock company Tomsk distribution company transmits and distributes electricity in Russia. It operates 17,864 kilometers of transmission lines; 137 power centers; and 3,148 substations with a transformer capacity of 3,859 MVA. The company was founded in 1952 and is based in Tomsk, Russia. public-stock company Tomsk distribution company is a subsidiary of Rosseti, Public Joint Stock Company.

TORSP.ME.summary: public-stock company Tomsk distribution company transmits and distributes electricity in Russia. It operates 17,864 kilometers of transmission lines; 137 power centers; and 3,148 substations with a transformer capacity of 3,859 MVA. The company was founded in 1952 and is based in Tomsk, Russia. public-stock company Tomsk distribution company is a subsidiary of Rosseti, Public Joint Stock Company.

UPRO.ME.summary: Public Joint-Stock Company Unipro engages in the generation and sale of electricity and heat in Russia. It operates five power plants with a total capacity of 11,245.1 megawatts. The company sells its electricity and capacity through wholesale electricity and capacity markets to retail companies. Public Joint-Stock Company Unipro is also involved in the provision of engineering and fund management activities. The company was formerly known as Open Joint-Stock Company E.ON Russia and changed its name to Public Joint-Stock Company Unipro in June 2016. The company was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Moscow, Russia. Public Joint-Stock Company Unipro is a subsidiary of Uniper SE.

VGSB.ME.summary: Volgogradenergosbyt Public Joint-Stock Company purchases and sells electricity in the retail market for industrial and other consumers in Volgograd. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Volgograd, Russia.

VRSB.ME.summary: Public Joint-stock Company TNS energo Voronezh purchases and sells electricity to legal entities and individuals in Russia. It serves approximately 24 thousand legal entities and 1 million private customers. The company was formerly known as Joint-stock company Voronezh energy selling company and changed its name to Public Joint-stock Company TNS energo Voronezh in June 2015. The company was founded in 1935 and is based in Voronezh, Russia. Public Joint-stock Company TNS energo Voronezh is a subsidiary of Public Joint Stock Company Group of Companies TNS energo.

YKEN.ME.summary: Public joint stock company Yakutskenergo engages in the production, transportation, and marketing of electricity and thermal energy in the Republic of Sakha. The company generates electricity through diesel, thermal, wind, and solar power plants. It also engages in the repair and construction of equipment, heating networks, and overhead lines. As of January 1, 2020, it had an installed electric capacity of 1,138.510 MW; and heat capacity of 1,723.651 Gcal/h. The company was incorporated in 1996 and is based in Yakutsk, Russia.

YKENP.ME.summary: Public joint stock company Yakutskenergo engages in the production, transportation, and marketing of electricity and thermal energy in the Republic of Sakha. The company generates electricity through diesel, thermal, wind, and solar power plants. It also engages in the repair and construction of equipment, heating networks, and overhead lines. As of January 1, 2020, it had an installed electric capacity of 1,138.510 MW; and heat capacity of 1,723.651 Gcal/h. The company was incorporated in 1996 and is based in Yakutsk, Russia.

YRSB.ME.long_name: Public Joint Stock Company TNS Energo Yaroslavl
YRSB.ME.summary: Public Joint Stock Company TNS Energo Yaroslavl supplies electricity to the wholesale and retail markets in Russia. It sells electricity to residents and businesses. The company was formerly known as Open Joint Stock Company Yaroslavl Retail Company and changed its name to Public Joint Stock Company TNS Energo Yaroslavl in June 2015. The company was founded in 1936 and is based in Yaroslavl, Russia. Public Joint Stock Company TNS Energo Yaroslavl is a subsidiary of Public Joint Stock Company Group of Companies TNS energo.
